player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

    Class used for instantiating the player objects of the poker game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Blind blind
      States if the player has to put in small blind, big blind or no blind at all.
      private int chips
      The amount of chips the player has.
      private int chipsOnTable
      The amount of chips the player has currently bet.
      private boolean dealer
      States if the player is dealer.
      Hand hand
      A poker hand the player has.
      private HoleCards holeCards
      The hole cards of the player.
      private int id
      Unique id of the player.
      private PlayerMove move
      The move the player choose to make.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the player.
      private PlayerState state
      The state the player is currently in.

      • Player

              int initChips,
              int playerID)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        playerName - Name of the player
        initChips - The number of chips the player has at the beginning of the game
        playerID - Unique id of the player.

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the players name.
        Returns:
        name - Player's Username.

      • getChips

        public int getChips()
        Get the number of chips the player has.
        Returns:
        chips Amount of player's current chips.

      • addChips

        public void addChips(int newChips)
        Give chips to the player.
        Parameters:
        newChips - The amount of chips that is given to the player.

      • removeChips

        public void removeChips(int lostChips)
        Remove chips from the player.
        Parameters:
        lostChips - The amount of chips that is removed from the player.

        Get the ID of the player.
        Returns:
        ID - Player's ID

        public Blind getBlind()
        Get the blind of the player.
        Returns:
        blind - Player's blind

      • setBlind

        public void setBlind(Blind playerBlind)
        Set the blind of the player.
        Parameters:
        playerBlind - The blind of the player (small, big or none)

      • isDealer

        public boolean isDealer()
        Returns:
        True if the player is dealer, otherwise false.

      • setDealer

        public void setDealer(boolean deal)
        Set if the player shall be dealer or not.
        Parameters:
        deal - True if the player shall be dealer, otherwise false.

      • getState

        public PlayerState getState()
        Get the state the player is currently in (in, all in, fold or lost)
        Returns:
        The state of the player

      • setState

        public void setState(PlayerState newState)
        Set the state the player shall switch to (in, all in, fold or lost)
        Parameters:
        newState - The state the player shall switch to

      • getMove

        public PlayerMove getMove()
        Get the move the player has chosen to make
        Returns:
        The move of the player

      • setMove

        public void setMove(PlayerMove nextMove)
        Set the move the player has chosen to make
        Parameters:
        nextMove - The move of the player

      • getChipsOnTable

        public int getChipsOnTable()
        Show the amount of chips the player currently has bet. Note, this method does not remove any chips from the player.
        Returns:
        The amount of chips the player has bet at the moment.

      • moveChipsToTable

        public void moveChipsToTable(int chips_)
        This function takes chips the player has and makes them to chips the player has bet.
        Parameters:
        chips_ - The number of chips the player shall bet.

      • takeChipsOnTable

        public int takeChipsOnTable()
        This function returns the chips the player has bet and sets the chips the player has bet to zero.
        Returns:
        The chips the player has bet.
